body:
I have the following xml:

	<RowSet>
	  <Row>
	    <Number>12345</Number>
	    <Quantity>42</Quantity>
	  </Row>
	  <Row>
	    <Number>12345</Number>
	    <Quantity>12</Quantity>
	  </Row>
	  <Row>
	    <Number>54321</Number>
	    <Quantity>37</Quantity>
	  </Row>
	</RowSet>
	

I want to use an xsl to combine the elements with the same Number and the resulting should sum the Quantity elements.  So the output should look like this:

	<RowSet>
	  <Row>
	    <Number>12345</Number>
	    <Quantity>64</Quantity>
	  </Row>
	  <Row>
	    <Number>54321</Number>
	    <Quantity>37</Quantity>
	  </Row>
	</RowSet>
title: Combine XML elements with xsl
